Statute.Title: Canada Disability Benefit Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Prestation canadienne pour les personnes handicap√©es, Loi sur la)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2023, c. 17 (assent: 22.06.2023), in force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council but no later than the first anniversary of the day on which it receives royal assent (22.06.2024) see s. 14
